definition: treated so as to be easily or quickly washed and dried and requiring little or no ironing, a fabric treated to be easily washable and to require no ironing
details:
adjective
- treated so as to be easily or quickly washed and dried and requiring little or no ironing
= example: treated so as to be easily or quickly washed and dried and requiring little or no ironing
= synonyms: drip-dry
noun
- a fabric treated to be easily washable and to require no ironing
